column2: 5. If your front wheels start to skid, the first thing you should do is:

column2: 11. What is the most important rule to remember in any emergency?

column4: The same as a steady yellow light.

column2: 13. When approaching an intersection with a flashing red light drivers must:
column4: come to a complete stop and remain stopped until the light turns green.

column2: 14. When driving in travel lanes on the roadway:
